Draft Rating:

C

Pat Riley ranks in the 48th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Riley's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Bam Adebayo with 14th pick but was worth 3th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Justise Winslow with 10th pick but was worth 40th pick.
  • Drafted Precious Achiuwa with 20th pick but was worth 50th pick.
  • Drafted Tyler Herro with 13th pick but was worth 20th pick.
